sources.name: RawYelpData
sources.script:
source(output(
		Id as integer,
		YelpId as string,
		Name as string,
		ReviewCount as integer,
		Rating as decimal(3,2),
		Category as string,
		SearchLocationCity as string,
		SearchLocationState as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	query: '',
	format: 'query') ~> RawYelpData

sinks.name: SinkToSQL
sinks.script:
AggregateReviewCountByRating sink(input(
		id as integer,
		RatingWithLocation as string,
		ReviewCount as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table',
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['RatingWithLocation'],
	mapColumn(
		RatingWithLocation,
		ReviewCount
	)) ~> SinkToSQL
